name: StarWheels - Golden Pack
detailed_description:
StarWheels : Golden Edition pack include

:
    All exclusive content will unlock on future updates.
  • StarWheels gold exclusive icones
  • Exclusive Golden Kart : Fight in the arena with your golden Kart.Kart own one exclusive passive ability.
  • Items Golden pack Get your own golden skin-pack for the 8 weapons in the Arena.
  • exclusive characters Drive your Kart with exclusive characters create only for golden pack owner

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64 bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-530 @ 2.93GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 540
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: StarWheels : Battle Kart Arena is an Early Access game, and minimum specifications may change during development
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 , Windows 8 , Windows 10 64 bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-530 @ 2.93GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 540
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: StarWheels : Battle Kart Arena is an Early Access game, and recommended specifications may change during development
